job.title: Network System Engineer
job.description: pstrongWe are hiring a System Network Engineer for a MSP Company to start immediately This is an on site contract to hire position NO C2C or SponsorshipstrongppbrppYou will be providing both remote and on site support in regards to any System and Network issues for the customersnbspppbrppstrongWe are looking for someone who is Required experiencesnbspstrongpulliExperienced in setting up and provisioning VMWare 6 amp 7nbspliliSupporting Layer 3 switchesnbspliliBachelor Degree or related certificates such as CCNA MCSE etcnbspliliSolid network and MS skills including cloud understanding of cyber security SonicWALL or solid firewall experienceliliAbility to support large scale WIFInbspliliProject Management experiencenbspliliA Valid Drivers license as you need to drive to clients sites when needednbspliliExcellent interpersonal communication skillsnbspliliA criminal background check will be conductednbspliul
